prompt: Text your group chat about what happened at lunch today using Gen-Alpha slang and emojis. Keep it short (50-100 words max).
response: Nahhh y’all, lunch today was actually wild 💀😭. Jay tried to rizz the lunch lady for extra fries and she hit him with the “nice try” NPC stare 😐🍟. Then Mia spilled her whole tray and everyone went “OOOOP” like it was a TikTok sound 😭. Coach walked by right when we were cackling and we had to lock in instantly 😤. Cafeteria vibes were pure chaos, no cap 💯.
